You must play this game if you own a PC. The story-telling is like nothing I've ever experienced before. Every place you go to has it's own atmosphere that draws you in for hours. While the enemies can sometimes be frustrating, everything you do is rewarding and you want to the game to go on forever. The weapons each have a personality of their own which makes them fun to use, and often times you can use various combinations to take out opponents. The driving sections are a blast; it really feels like your in the scrap pile of a vehicle that's somehow staying together. Really, just play this game.
Half-Life 3 confirmed?

When Half-Life 2 was reviled to the public my first thought was oh another underground based wave after wave fighting game but no I stand amazed by the level of detail and complexity of the game and its story line picking up where Half-Life left off this has to be one of the best sequels I have played so far the weapons are in keeping with modern weaponry and not radically flamboyant in there looks it has kind of a in the dirt gritty feel that make the player feel its Gordon Freeman against a world of aliens great work Valve I give Half-Life 2 a score of 7/10.
I know you will hate me if i say that Half Life 2 is boring, so I am saying that it is awesome

Next gen graphics 10 years early. A prime example of how to make a video game. The best of valve's many exceptional games, all that you need to know is that the right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world...

After seeing this was one of the highest ranked pc games I decided to buy it. After an interesting opening level it became boring and repetitive very quickly. I persevered with it for a few hours, hoping that I would find something to merit the rave reviews I'd read, but, alas, it seemed to just get more and more boring. After I don't know how many hours and minutes of going through a gloomy looking swamp-like canal on a hovercraft thing I began to suspect the game wasn't going to live up to it's hype, so I decided to return it. Alas Steam said I'd played it for five hours and was not thus entitled to a refund. I had thought that one was entitled to a refund on anything one purchased online within a certain time period, this however is not the case with Steam, since I have found multiple reviewers complaining that Steam wouldn't refund them - even in cases where people couldn't even get the game to run. This experience has given me a sharp reminder of the pre-internet days when the customer was always wrong and hadn't a hope of getting refunded on any kind of purchase. I guess when a company is as big as Steam customer satisfaction doesn't matter a fig.

Ebenfalls kann ich die beiden Episoden zu HL2 jedem nur wärmstens empfehlen.

Игра супер! 
Все самые мелкие шестеренки этой игры работают как один большой механизм — на все сто, без единого сбоя и прокола. Поэтому описывать игру привычными нам критериями, по частям, в рамках “графика-звук-сюжет” по меньшей мере глупо.

Геймплей:9.5/10
Сюжет: 10/10
Графика:10/10
Звуки и музыка:9/10
Реигребальность: 11/10. Её можно пройти 10, а то ибольше раз на Одном дыхании. 
В итоге: 10/10, т.е Великолепно.

The best or the worst game? Would you rather see the story develop or never begin to watch? After completing the playthrough of this game, I wasn't sure how to answer. The content and characters and story-driven plot are all original, so who whouldn't want to invest their time and emotions into something so innovative? I was one of those people. I found myself not playing the outstanding first-person story only once, but many times, despite its length. Do not fall for the addiction of this game. Although you may ask yourself, "What's the worst that could happen?", be prepared for the feelings you develop in this game to be crushed and lifted through its series of unforseen plot twists. The mightiest plot twist of them all might have you saying, "I wish it never started"...

[h1] Шедевр который мы заслуживаем [/h1]

Игра которая входит в список моих любимых игр, в ней интересно все, от механики и окружающего мира, до сюжета и атмосферы.

Сюжет
Продолжение первой части и двух  дополнений для нее, мир, разруха, Сити 17,  тоталитарное правительство. Я не хочу вам говорить сюжет, его нужно пройти самому. Он интересный. Поверьте.

Графика
Даже сейчас она смотрится красиво, физика, атмосфера тут есть все. Эта графика не стареет.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=548589024

Физика
Движок дает прикурить многим современным играм.

Геймплей

В этой игре есть и гонки, и хоррор, и выживальшик, и шутер. Интересные секреты, перестрелки и головоломки (простые, но сойдут).
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=557106936

Как итог
Это шедевр, по данной игре нужно изучать то, как делать игры. Давно стала классикой. Рекомендую.
